meanings.sent1: She transshapes her clay into beautiful sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar transshapes into a butterfly.
meanings.sent3: The wizard transshapes a pumpkin into a carriage.
meanings.sent4: Time transshapes all things, like a sculptor shaping clay.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hands transshape the canvas into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of transforming or altering in shape.
meanings.sent1: The transshapes of the clouds fascinated the children.
meanings.sent2: The transshapes of the origami amazed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The transshapes of the balloon animals brought smiles to the party.
meanings.sent4: The transshapes of the shadows danced on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The transshapes of the sand dunes created a mesmerizing landscape.

meanings.definition: The process of reshaping or changing appearance.
meanings.sent1: The transshapes of the costume revealed a hidden identity.
meanings.sent2: The transshapes of the chameleon helped it blend into its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The transshapes of the ice sculpture melted away in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The transshapes of the city skyline at night are breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The transshapes of the clouds painted a beautiful picture in the sky.
